title: MySQL
description: MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system.

snippets.Create Table:
CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    age INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
snippets.Insert Data:
-- Insert single row
INSERT INTO users (name, email, age)
VALUES ('John', 'john@example.com', 30);

-- Insert multiple rows
INSERT INTO users (name, email, age)
VALUES 
    ('Alice', 'alice@example.com', 25),
    ('Bob', 'bob@example.com', 35);
snippets.Update Data:
-- Update single row
UPDATE users
SET age = 31
WHERE name = 'John';

-- Update multiple columns
UPDATE users
SET age = 26, email = 'newemail@example.com'
WHERE id = 1;
snippets.Joins:
-- Inner join
SELECT users.name, orders.total
FROM users
INNER JOIN orders ON users.id = orders.user_id;

-- Left join
SELECT users.name, orders.total
FROM users
LEFT JOIN orders ON users.id = orders.user_id;
